meanings.definition: A strict adherence to the teachings of the Bible.
meanings.sent1: Her biblicism guided her every decision.
meanings.sent2: The community's biblicism shaped their traditions.
meanings.sent3: His biblicism was so strong, he wouldn't even miss a Sunday service.
meanings.sent4: The foundation of their faith was built on biblicism.
meanings.sent5: The preacher's passionate biblicism inspired many to seek wisdom in the scriptures.

meanings.definition: The belief that the Bible is the ultimate authority in matters of faith and practice.
meanings.sent1: Their biblicism led them to seek answers in the scriptures.
meanings.sent2: In times of doubt, her biblicism provided comfort.
meanings.sent3: Even in jest, his biblicism never wavered.
meanings.sent4: The strength of their community was rooted in biblicism.
meanings.sent5: The power of biblicism united believers in a common purpose.
